nodes.text: Pijal varactyls were a subspecies of the majestic, giant reptavians, varactyls. The original varactyls had been imported to Pijal from Utapau by the Iltan clan to have an edge in the Grand Hunt. They were bred into the unique streamlined, swift, crimson-feathered Pijal varactyl. While on Pijal, Obi-Wan Kenobi formed a bond with one of these varactyls, which he later rode in the Grand Hunt.
